courseWork.title: Activity 1
courseWork.description:
Work with a partner. 
For more background information on Technical Writing, please read:
What Is Technical Writing? Definition, Examples and Steps
https://www.indeed.com/career-advice/career-development/technical-writing

Watch the videos listed below.  
After watching, answer the questions that follow:
Meet Technical Writers at Google

https://youtu.be/qnnkAWP55Ww?si=5wnJxyCU5exQd15t
1. What do they mean when they said, "Technical writing is more like deleting."?

What Does a Technical Writer Do?
https://youtu.be/8LewoMIyQfw?si=NjUvLmezKoe33Iv9
2. From the video, list down the 4 Primary Responsibilities of a Technical Writer.
3. List down the 7 Skill Requirements of a Technical Writer.


Reminders:

Font size 12
Spacing 2.0
Only 1 will submit the work here.  Don't forget to write the name of your partner.

comments.comment: Kashi, where is your work and who is your partner?
comments.commentHtml: Kashi, where is your work and who is your partner?

comments.comment: Good afternoon miss.  My partner is Abrau, and we followed the instructions provided, which specified that only one of us should submit the paper. Abrau has submitted the work as per those instructions. If there are any concerns or further information needed, please let me know miss.
comments.commentHtml: Good afternoon miss.  My partner is Abrau, and we followed the instructions provided, which specified that only one of us should submit the paper. Abrau has submitted the work as per those instructions. If there are any concerns or further information needed, please let me know miss.

comments.comment: Hi Kashi! Yes, i just reviewed the submissions and found ur name in Abrau’s work.
comments.commentHtml: Hi Kashi! Yes, i just reviewed the submissions and found ur name in Abrau’s work.
